Description: • Establish a new 275 kV substation north of Millstream. • Build a 275 kV double-circuit line from Chalumbin to Millstream. • Rebuild the double-circuit Chalumbin–Ross 275 kV line at a higher capacity (possibly timed with asset replacement). • Build additional Chalumbin-Ross 275 kV double-circuit tower but switch as a single-circuit line (energise second line as generation develops)

• Establish a new 275 kV substation in the Lakeland area • Build a double-circuit 275 kV line from Walkamin to the new substation near Lakeland. • Build a new 275 kV Chalumbin–Walkamin single-circuit line. • Rebuild the double-circuit Chalumbin–Ross 275 kV line at a higher capacity (possibly timed with asset replacement). • Build additional Chalumbin-Ross 275 kV double-circuit tower but switch as a single-circuit line (energise second line as generation develops)

CopperString 2032: •	Establish a new 500 kV substation south of Townsville (NQ 500 kV Substation) •	Install 2x500/275 kV, 1500 MVA transformers at NQ 500kV substation •	Establish a new NQ 275 kV substation •	Cut-in the Strathmore to Ross 275kV DCST and SCST lines to the NQ 275kV Substation. •	Establish a new 500 kV substation at Hughenden with associated switchgear and bays. •	Establish a new 500kV substation (mid-point between NQ 500 kV and Hughenden substations) with associated switchgear and bays. •	A new 500 kV transmission line from south of Townsville to Hughenden •	A new 330 kV transmission line from Hughenden to Cloncurry •	A new 220 kV transmission line from Cloncurry to Mount Isa •	Up to six new substation sites
Additional network capacity (MW): 1500 nominal 2300 if NQ_x0002_CQ Option 2 is selected.
Expected cost ($ million): This project is considered to be anticipated and so is not included as an option here. The scope of the project is listed here for context only.

Description: • Establish a 275 kV yard at Kidston substation near Forsayth. • Build a 275 kV double-circuit line from Kidston to Guybal Munjan Substation (energise only a single line until generation in the REZ develops).
• Energise the second circuit on the line established in Option 1. • Additional reactors if required. Pre-requisite: Q2 Option 1
• Establish a 275 kV substation in the Barcaldine region • Build a 340 km 275 kV double-circuit line from Lilyvale to Barcaldine (energise only a single line until generation in the REZ develops).
• Energise the second circuit on the line established in Option 1. • Additional substation bays and reactors. Pre-requisite: Q5 Option 1

Option: See SWQLD1 Transmission Limit constraint augmentations

Description: • Establish a new 500 kV substation within the Banana REZ. • 200 km double-circuit 500 kV line from the Banana REZ to CQ substation associated with CQ-SQ Option 5. • Additional 500/275 kV 1500 MVA transformer at the CQ substation. • Switchgear at CQ substation. Pre-requisite: CQ-SQ Option 5

• Establish a new 275 kV substation within the Banana REZ. • 100 km high capacity double-circuit 275 kV line from Banana REZ to Calvale Substation. • Associated switchgear • Limit extension special protection scheme (similar to a virtual transmission line). Cost of non-network service agreement excluded.
• Establish a new 275 kV substation within the Banana REZ. • 195 km double-circuit 275 kV line from Banana REZ to Wandoan South. • Switchgear at Wandoan South.

REZ Name: Group constraint - Facilitating power to Central Queensland
Description: • Construct additional 275 kV circuit from Bouldercombe – Stanwell. • String and energise the second Broadsound-Stanwell 275 kV additional circuit (on existing DCST).
System strength connection costs ($M/MW): Included in individual REZ expansion cost

REZ Name: Group constraint - Facilitating power to Central Queensland
Description: • Additional 275 kV double-circuit lines between Central and North Queensland
• Rebuild Woolooga – Palmwood - South Pine 275 kV single-circuit line as a high-capacity double-circuit line. • 100 MVAr reactor for voltage control.
• Rebuild Woolooga – South Pine 275 kV single-circuit line as a high-capacity double-circuit line • 100 MVAr reactor for voltage control
• Prerequisite is CQ-SQ Option 5 • New 500 kV substation works at Borumba substation • Cut-in Halys-Woolooga West 500 kV line at Borumba

• Replace existing 1300 MVA 330/275 kV transformer at Middle Ridge with 1500 MVA 330/275 kV transformer. • Limit extension special protection system splitting scheme. Cost of non-service agreement excluded
• Limit extension special protection scheme – run-back of generation in SWQ with 300MW BESS response in SEQ (similar to a virtual transmission line).
Expected cost ($ million): To be provided by interested parties

Description: • Prerequisite is NNSW-SQ Option 5 and CQ-SQ Option 5 and SQ1 option 3 • New 2x 500/275 kV 1500 MVA transformers at Western Downs with associated switchgear and bays • Cut-in 500 kV DCST lines from Halys to NNSW and associated switchgear and bays
